CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Enhanced Filters and Custom Views
CurrentVersion.description: User can now filter OKRs in entity and explorer pages and save custom views to quickly access views that are most relevant.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Enhanced Filters and Custom Views
OldVersion.description: User can now filter OKRs in entity and explorer pages and save custom views to quickly access views that are most relevant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: We apologize for the inconvenience, but this item was updated to Rolling out incorrectly. Thank you for your patience. The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: We apologize for the inconvenience, but this item was updated to Rolling out incorrectly. Thank you for your patience. The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Improved creation, editability, and saved views in review dashboards
CurrentVersion.description:
Users will save time in preparing for goal review
processes with a simplified review dashboard creation and editing experience,
and the ability to leverage saved views instead of starting from scratch. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Improved creation, editability, and saved views in review dashboards
OldVersion.description:
Users will save time in preparing for goal review
processes with a simplified review dashboard creation and editing experience,
and the ability to leverage saved views instead of starting from scratch.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Meetings will suggest follow up questions to ask it
CurrentVersion.description: When Copilot in Teams Meetings responds to a prompt, it will also suggest follow ups to keep the conversation going. These questions will generally be based on the response it gave prior, and could be related to honing in on a particular topic, asking for more details, or asking what a particular person said during the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Meetings will suggest follow up questions to ask it
OldVersion.description: When Copilot in Teams Meetings responds to a prompt, it will also suggest follow ups to keep the conversation going. These questions will generally be based on the response it gave prior, and could be related to honing in on a particular topic, asking for more details, or asking what a particular person said during the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Newsletters
CurrentVersion.description: Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Newsletters
OldVersion.description: Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Reference data from the Microsoft cloud when drafting with Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description:
Description & title updated to address a publishing issue, correct description as follows: Draft with Copilot will support attaching rich content from the Microsoft cloud--including emails and meetings--resulting in content that's more contextually relevant.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/microsoft365copilotblog/what%E2%80%99s-new-in-microsoft-365-copilot-in-word-at-ignite-2024/4303448

OldVersion.title: Reference data from the Microsoft cloud when drafting with Copilot in Word
OldVersion.description:
Description & title updated to address a publishing issue, correct description as follows: Draft with Copilot will support attaching rich content from the Microsoft cloud--including emails and meetings--resulting in content that's more contextually relevant.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/microsoft365copilotblog/what%E2%80%99s-new-in-microsoft-365-copilot-in-word-at-ignite-2024/4303448

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
CurrentVersion.description: This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
OldVersion.description: This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: "Help me create" in Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: "Help me create" is a content create feature in Microsoft365.com that is powered by Copilot for Microsoft 365. Like Copilot, "Help me create" is built on Microsoft's comprehensive approach to security, compliance, and privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365: "Help me create" in Microsoft 365
OldVersion.description: "Help me create" is a content create feature in Microsoft365.com that is powered by Copilot for Microsoft 365. Like Copilot, "Help me create" is built on Microsoft's comprehensive approach to security, compliance, and privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Dashboard personalization on tablet in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Customize your dashboard by adding, removing, or reordering the dashboard cards.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Dashboard personalization on tablet in Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: Customize your dashboard by adding, removing, or reordering the dashboard cards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot for Microsoft 365 now available in the Microsoft Start app
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license will be able to receive answers grounded in their organizational Graph data with the Microsoft Start app. The app is available for iOS and Android. This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate. We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot for Microsoft 365 now available in the Microsoft Start app
OldVersion.description: Users with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license will be able to receive answers grounded in their organizational Graph data with the Microsoft Start app. The app is available for iOS and Android.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background on Teams panels
CurrentVersion.description: Administrators can upload and set custom background images for Teams panels through the Teams admin center, enabling them to reflect their organization's branding. This feature will be available for Teams Rooms Pro and Teams Shared Devices licensed panels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background on Teams panels
OldVersion.description: Administrators can upload and set custom background images for Teams panels through the Teams admin center, enabling them to reflect their organization's branding. This feature will be available for Teams Rooms Pro and Teams Shared Devices licensed panels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse series for continuous feedback supporting AI transformations and change management
CurrentVersion.description: New Pulse series templates are being introduced that are tailored to supporting continuous feedback scenarios for high value use cases such as change management.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse series for continuous feedback supporting AI transformations and change management
OldVersion.description: New Pulse series templates are being introduced that are tailored to supporting continuous feedback scenarios for high value use cases such as change management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app on Teams phone devices
CurrentVersion.description: Queues app on Teams phone devices enhances call management capabilities by allowing agents to handle incoming calls, view call queues, and manage call history directly from their Teams phone devices, improving efficiency and ensuring effortless communication for agents.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app on Teams phone devices
OldVersion.description: Queues app on Teams phone devices enhances call management capabilities by allowing agents to handle incoming calls, view call queues, and manage call history directly from their Teams phone devices, improving efficiency and ensuring effortless communication for agents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative call delegation on Teams phone devices
CurrentVersion.description: Teams phone device users will be able to share access to their phone line with a specific group of users, without a structured delegation system. This enables group members to receive calls and initiate calls on behalf of others, enabling a simple and collaborative communication experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative call delegation on Teams phone devices
OldVersion.description: Teams phone device users will be able to share access to their phone line with a specific group of users, without a structured delegation system. This enables group members to receive calls and initiate calls on behalf of others, enabling a simple and collaborative communication experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom name for Teams panels
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can use the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal to assign a custom name to their Teams Rooms Pro or Teams Shared Device licensed panels. This new name displays on the panel's home screen, replacing the global address book name that appears in Outlook or Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom name for Teams panels
OldVersion.description: Admins can use the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal to assign a custom name to their Teams Rooms Pro or Teams Shared Device licensed panels. This new name displays on the panel's home screen, replacing the global address book name that appears in Outlook or Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution available in additional meeting spaces
CurrentVersion.description: You can now take advantage of speaker recognition and transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in additional meeting spaces, from those equipped with a Teams Room to those relying on a user's PC in a bring you own device (BYOD) room. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot in Teams meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. A Teams Premium license is required on the host desktop in a BYOD room.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution available in additional meeting spaces
OldVersion.description: You can now take advantage of speaker recognition and transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in additional meeting spaces, from those equipped with a Teams Room to those relying on a user's PC in a bring you own device (BYOD) room. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot in Teams meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. A Teams Premium license is required on the host desktop in a BYOD room.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Meeting details card for shared and delegated calendar invites
CurrentVersion.description: Delegates will be able to see the shared calendar event details, including the principal calendar, in the meeting details card on meeting invite messages. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Meeting details card for shared and delegated calendar invites
OldVersion.description: Delegates will be able to see the shared calendar event details, including the principal calendar, in the meeting details card on meeting invite messages. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-meeting Chat, Copilot, and Notes panes can be popped out from the meeting window
CurrentVersion.description: When you are in meetings or calls, you will be able to pop out, drag, and resize your meeting panes from the meeting window. This includes Chat, Copilot, and Notes side panes.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-meeting Chat, Copilot, and Notes panes can be popped out from the meeting window
OldVersion.description: When you are in meetings or calls, you will be able to pop out, drag, and resize your meeting panes from the meeting window. This includes Chat, Copilot, and Notes side panes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft Copilot Dashboard Scope Filter enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing exciting new features to help you better understand and improve adoption and impact of Copilot for Microsoft 365 through the Copilot Dashboard. Enhancements include supporting multi-select capabilities for Scope filters to facilitate group comparisons and the ability to upload HR organizational data for Scope filter updates.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft Copilot Dashboard filter and other dashboard enhancements
OldVersion.description: Introducing exciting new features to help you better understand and improve adoption and impact of Copilot for Microsoft 365 through the Copilot Dashboard. Enhancements include the following: supporting multi-select capabilities for Scope filters to facilitate group comparisons and the ability to upload HR organizational data for Scope filter updates; and synchronized date ranges across the Readiness and Adoption pages for consistency and ease of analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Places is an AI-powered workplace app for flexible work, empowering hybrid employees to foster in-office collaboration and leveraging insights into space optimization. Places intelligently allows you to coordinate your hybrid team to make the most of in-office days, modernize how employees make connections, and optimize space management with occupancy and utilization data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Places is an AI-powered workplace app for flexible work, empowering hybrid employees to foster in-office collaboration and leveraging insights into space optimization. Places intelligently allows you to coordinate your hybrid team to make the most of in-office days, modernize how employees make connections, and optimize space management with occupancy and utilization data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - EXPORT ENHANCEMENTS
CurrentVersion.description: With the export of data being one of the core fundamentals of the solution, Microsoft Purview eDiscovery team is excited to announce significant changes coming to the export feature along with the new user experience in purview.microsoft.com. Key changes with export enhancements: The biggest change being introduced is that with the new user experience for eDiscovery where Standard and Premium cases have unified structure, the export is also aligned for both the streams – thereby providing a singular experience to customers. The behavior is now unified across all export jobs - same download experience, some report experience, same error messages. For Standard customers, the need to install a clickonce application in their machine and use that tool to download data for exporting in azure storage is history. Now, in the new experience, customers don’t need to install the app anymore and can download directly through browser. Additionally, customers will experience a faster export capability in the new portal driven through enhancements in backend architecture and optimized partition.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - EXPORT ENHANCEMENTS
OldVersion.description: With the export of data being one of the core fundamentals of the solution, Microsoft Purview eDiscovery team is excited to announce significant changes coming to the export feature along with the new user experience in purview.microsoft.com. Key changes with export enhancements: The biggest change being introduced is that with the new user experience for eDiscovery where Standard and Premium cases have unified structure, the export is also aligned for both the streams – thereby providing a singular experience to customers. The behavior is now unified across all export jobs - same download experience, some report experience, same error messages. For Standard customers, the need to install a clickonce application in their machine and use that tool to download data for exporting in azure storage is history. Now, in the new experience, customers don’t need to install the app anymore and can download directly through browser. Additionally, customers will experience a faster export capability in the new portal driven through enhancements in backend architecture and optimized partition.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message recall in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: From the Outlook for iOS and Android apps, you can request Outlook to attempt to recall a message sent to a colleague within your organization

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Message recall in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
OldVersion.description: From the Outlook for iOS and Android apps, you can request Outlook to attempt to recall a message sent to a colleague within your organization

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can use TypeSpec as an authoring experience
CurrentVersion.description: Developers can use TypeSpec as an authoring experience for declarative agents and API plugins in Teams Toolkit.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Copilot Chat developer mode
CurrentVersion.description: Developers can use Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat and enable developer mode to debug.
